post_message: Elephants performed for the last time in the Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey Circus on Sunday, putting an end to the controversial practice. The animals will live at the 200-acre Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey Center for Elephant Conservation in Florida.
